question.questionText: How do you know when a solid and a liquid form a solution?

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: The solid dissolves (seems to disappear) and the liquid remains clear.

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: Because you can see through it, and the mixture will dissolve into it.
You can not see the solid no more because it is going and you cannot see the solution.
You know when the solid cannot be seen.
When the solid dissolves into the liquid.
